name: x-speed
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s Speed by one stage. Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
short_effect: Raises Speed by one stage in battle. Raises happiness.

flavor_text.black_white: An item that raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item that raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
